name: Tags.Fluids
description: Note, fluid tags should not be plural to match the vanilla standard. This is the only tag category exempted from many-different-types plural rule.

fields.name: WATER
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to water. This tag is done to help out multi-loader mods/datapacks where the vanilla water tag has attached behaviors outside Neo.

fields.name: LAVA
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to lava. This tag is done to help out multi-loader mods/datapacks where the vanilla lava tag has attached behaviors outside Neo.

fields.name: MILK
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to milk.

fields.name: GASEOUS
fields.description: Holds all fluids that are gaseous at room temperature.

fields.name: HONEY
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to honey. (Standard unit for honey bottle is 250mb per bottle)

fields.name: POTION
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to potions. The effects of the potion fluid should be read from NBT. The effects and color of the potion fluid should be read from DataComponents.POTION_CONTENTS component that people should be attaching to the fluidstack of this fluid. (Standard unit for potions is 250mb per bottle)

fields.name: SUSPICIOUS_STEW
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to Suspicious Stew. The effects of the suspicious stew fluid should be read from DataComponents.SUSPICIOUS_STEW_EFFECTS component that people should be attaching to the fluidstack of this fluid. (Standard unit for suspicious stew is 250mb per bowl)

fields.name: MUSHROOM_STEW
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to Mushroom Stew. (Standard unit for mushroom stew is 250mb per bowl)

fields.name: RABBIT_STEW
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to Rabbit Stew. (Standard unit for rabbit stew is 250mb per bowl)

fields.name: BEETROOT_SOUP
fields.description: Holds all fluids related to Beetroot Soup. (Standard unit for beetroot soup is 250mb per bowl)

fields.name: HIDDEN_FROM_RECIPE_VIEWERS
fields.description: Tag that holds all fluids that recipe viewers should not show to users.
